common.learnAboutDifferentKindsOfWaste: Learn about the different kinds of waste you can recycle

common.yourTransactionIsProtected: Your transaction is protected by 256-bit SSL encryption
common.yourDonationIsCompletelySecure: Your donation is completely secure and protected. We use bank-level encryption to ensure your personal and payment information remains safe. Every contribution goes directly to the organization you've chosen to support.
common.karakibMakesItEasyToCollectWaste: Karakib makes it easy to collect waste, earn points, and turn your actions into real rewards ‚Äî because sustainability should pay off.
common.supportKarakibMission: Support Karakib's mission by buying eco-friendly merchandise. Every purchase funds our recycling and community projects.
common.everySmallActOfRecyclingCreatesCleanerTo: Every small act of recycling creates a cleaner tomorrow
common.name: Name
common.karakibIsEcoFriendlyPlatform: Karakib is an eco-friendly platform that rewards recycling and supports a sustainable future. Join our mission to keep Egypt clean and green.
common.workingTogetherForCleanerFuture: Working Together for a Cleaner Future
common.karakibSimplifiesRecyclingProcess: Karakib simplifies the recycling process by allowing users to collect, schedule pickups, and earn points effortlessly. We believe sustainability should be accessible and rewarding for everyone.
common.ourGoalIsToBuildNetwork: Our goal is to build a network of individuals and organizations working together toward a greener, more sustainable Egypt. Recycling isn't just a habit ‚Äî it's a lifestyle.
common.karakibCombinesTechnologyAndEnvironmenta: Karakib combines technology and environmental care to make recycling smarter. We continuously improve our platform to create a positive impact for both users and the planet.
common.youCanRecycleBySubmittingWaste: You can recycle by submitting your waste and scheduling a pickup via our platform.
common.whatTypeOfWasteCanIRecycle: What type of waste can I recycle?
common.weCurrentlyAcceptPlasticMetalsPaper: We currently accept plastic, metals, paper, e-waste, glass, and more.
common.howCanITrackMyEarnings: How can I track my earnings?
common.youCanViewYourEarningsAndHistory: You can view your earnings and history directly from your Karakib profile.
common.howDoIRedeemMyPoints: How do I redeem my points?
common.youCanRedeemYourCollectedPoints: You can redeem your collected points for cash or rewards through our partners.
common.pleaseReadCarefullyBeforeUsingKarakib: Please read carefully before using Karakib.
common.byUsingKarakibYouAgree: By using Karakib, you agree to take responsibility for recycling waste materials in an environmentally friendly manner.
common.usersAreAlsoResponsible: Users are also responsible for the safety and quality of waste they submit through the platform.
common.karakibWillNotBeHeldResponsible: Karakib will not be held responsible for losses or damages that occur as a result of improper waste handling before our team reviews or collects it.
common.anyMisuseOfPlatform: Any misuse of the platform, including providing false information, will result in immediate suspension of the user's account.
common.weMayUpdateTheseTerms: We may update these terms at any time. You are responsible for reviewing them periodically.
common.weAreHappyToAnswerQuestions: We're happy to answer any questions or partnership requests.

common.weAreHereToHelpYou: We're here to help you make the planet cleaner!
